Hi.

>  =A0=A0 Please, To a person trying to learn to speak Japanese, Which=
 is

With dili=
gent practice, you can learn both of them in about a week to 
ten days of p=
art time study. However, hiragana will be of much greater 
use to you than =
katakana, so I suggest that you learn it first.
